project_abstract.cdata: This additional financing for Cape Verde HIV/AIDS project satisfies the conditions for additional financing for investment lending: (a) it will support activities that will increase the project's impact in a manner consistent with the Project Appraisal Document (PAD) presented to the Board in March 2002; (b) the current IDA financed project is properly implemented; (c) activities to be financed have shown results under the ongoing project; and (d) the closing date will be within the limit of three years after closing of the initial project. The additional financing will also help set up mechanisms to ensure sustainability after project completion.
